revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

__TOC__
==Description==
Using a Pickaxe or a Shovel allows a miner with sufficient [[Mining]] skill to dig up Ores, which can then be smelted to produce an Ingot. Low level minors will only be able to produce Iron ore and [[Ingots]], but as they level, they may extract colored ingots. These [[Ingots]] are used by players with [[Blacksmithing]] and [[Tinkering]] for [[Crafting]] purposes.

Ingots in addition to basic crafting recipes allows you to craft [[Cannon Balls]] and other useful resources for the Ships in the [[Naval Warfare Reborn]] expansion.

Aside from [[Mining]], ore and ingots can be found from certain monsters such as:

*Agapite Elemental
*Dull copper Elemental
*Copper Elemental
*Earth Elemental
*Golden Elemental
*Shadow Iron Elemental
*Stone Gargoyle
*Valorite Elemental
*Verite Elemental

==Smelting==
Before ores can be used by crafters, they must be smelted down into ingots using a forge. This can be done by dragging or carrying the ore to a forge and either double clicking the ore pile in their backpack or on the ground. If you're within acceptable range of the force, it will smelt.
